mapper.select: select grp_cd grpCd, cd, cd_nm cdNm, use_yn useYn, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd = #{code} AND use_yn = 'y'

select grp_cd grpCd, cd, cd_nm cdNm, use_yn useYn, reg_dtime regDtime, mod_dtime modDtime, reg_id regId, mod_id modId FROM st_std_cd WHERE grp_cd = 'T001' AND CD LIKE CONCAT(#{deptCd}, '%') AND use_yn = 'y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_std_cd( grp_cd, cd, cd_nm, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{grpCd}, #{cd}, #{cdNm}, NOW(), NOW(), #{regId}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE st_std_cd SET cd_nm = #{updateCdNm}, mod_id = #{loginId}, mod_dtime = NOW() WHERE grp_cd = #{grpCd} AND cd_nm = #{originCdNm}
